CustomField.defaultValue: "1- Current Inventory - Current inventory assessment in our inventory/control, items to be held until investigation complete, items ok to release. To help avoid selling more of the same problem." & BR() & "2- Recommendations - Recommendations on how to proceed with inventory at customer locations." & BR() & "3- Operating Conditions - Line operating conditions at the time of the incident." & BR() & "4- Root Cause Analysis:" & BR() & " " + " " + " " + " " + "4.1 - Production Issues Cause Analysis." & BR() & " " + " " + " " + " " + "4.2 - Product Leaving the Plant Root Cause Analysis." & BR() & "5- Units Impacted - Estimated number of units impacted and number of units sold to the market." & BR() & "6- Permanent Corrective Action - To eliminate re-occurrences, action plans, accountability by name, targeted completion date, verification by Plant Manager." & BR() & "7- Communications - List communications with other plants to help them avoid the same problem."
CustomField.description: https://ikoussfsc.atlassian.net/browse/CLAIMSV2-66 Capture the Plant Team comments. Pre populate the field with PRM six categories
CustomField.label: Description
